channel.title: Widgetframe on widgetframe + blogdown
channel.description: Recent content in Widgetframe on widgetframe + blogdown

item.title: DT + widgeframe
item.description: The two examples below show how to properly embed a DT widget inside a blog post using the widgetframe package. DT library(DT) library(widgetframe) ## Loading required package: htmlwidgets dt <- datatable( head(iris, 20), options = list( columnDefs = list(list(className = 'dt-center', targets = 5)), pageLength = 5, lengthMenu = c(5, 10, 15, 20)), fillContainer = T) frameWidget(dt, height = 350, width = '95%') {"x":{"url":"/post/dt_files/figure-html//widgets/widget_dt-01.html","options":{"xdomain":"*","allowfullscreen":false}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

item.title: dygraphs + widgeframe
item.description: The two examples below show how to properly embed a dygraphs widget inside a blog post using the widgetframe package. Dygraph library(dygraphs) library(widgetframe) ## Loading required package: htmlwidgets ts <- dygraph(nhtemp, main = "New Haven Temperatures") frameWidget(ts, height = 350, width = '95%') {"x":{"url":"/post/dygraphs_files/figure-html//widgets/widget_dygraph-01.html","options":{"xdomain":"*","allowfullscreen":false}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

item.title: leaflet + widgeframe
item.description: The two examples below show how to properly embed a leaflet widget inside a blog post using the widgetframe package. Leaflet 01 library(leaflet) library(widgetframe) ## Loading required package: htmlwidgets l <- leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% setView(0,0,2) frameWidget(l, height = '400') {"x":{"url":"/post/leaflet_files/figure-html//widgets/widget_leaflet-01.html","options":{"xdomain":"*","allowfullscreen":false}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} Leaflet 02 library(leaflet) suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(widgetframe)) l <- leaflet() %>% addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.DarkMatter) %>% setView(0,0,2) frameWidget(l, height = '300') {"x":{"url":"/post/leaflet_files/figure-html//widgets/widget_leaflet-02.html","options":{"xdomain":"*","allowfullscreen":false}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}
